app.title: Fayl Yuklash
app.description: Fayllar va papkalarni oson yuklang. Jarayonni kuzating, to'xtating va davom ettiring.

uploadedFiles.title: Yuklangan fayllar
uploadedFiles.noFilesDesc: Fayllarni bu yerda ko'rish uchun yuklang

mediaPlayer.previewNotAvailableDesc: Bu fayl turini brauzerda ko'rib bo'lmaydi.

folderSupport.title: Papka qo'llab-quvvatlash
folderSupport.description: Papka tuzilishi saqlanib, butun papkalarni yuklang

pauseResume.title: To'xtatish va davom ettirish
pauseResume.description: Yuklashlarni to'xtatish va davom ettirish imkoniyati

progressTracking.title: Jarayonni kuzatish
progressTracking.description: Har bir fayl uchun real vaqtda jarayon ko'rsatkichi
